file_content.text: Watch your head out there. The inmates are as bad as the wardens.
Look who's back. Heard the alarms--you manage to take out the surgery labs?
It's finished.
Great news. No new prisoners coming here--and you can bet the wardens are scared.
I've seen horrible things, but those labs rank with the worst.
Those places were awful.
I've been living here for months. I know how bad it gets.
The labs are in shambles, but they'll rebuild.
I doubt it'll do much good.
Maybe. Eventually. For now, they can't bring a single new prisoner into Shadow Town.
Grab any supplies from my cache; us "enemies of the Empire" have to stick together.
The surgery labs keep the prisoners in check. Take them out, no new prisoners.
Slowly! I've killed plenty today.
You the Republic team? Heard you guys were attacking Shadow Town--came to find you.
You that Jedi? Heard you were attacking Shadow Town--came out to find you.
You Special Forces? Heard the Republic was attacking Shadow Town--came out to find you.
You with the Republic? Heard you were attacking Shadow Town--came out to find you.
Lower your weapon and I'll lower mine. What's going on?
Let's not start a fight.
What exactly do you want?
Find me?
I don't like being threatened.
That's your last mistake.
Neither do I. Something we've got in common.
Name's Sarn. Freelance assassin. Used to work for the Imps, but they decided I knew too much--brought me here.
I was set to be processed. Anyone loose in Shadow Town gets a bomb stuck in his head to keep 'em in line. I avoided that fate.
What kept them from "processing" you?
How did you escape?
I built up a tolerance for poisons in my work. The Imps weren't ready when the tranquilizers wore off.
Never thought I'd be listening to an Imperial assassin.
And now you've changed sides.
I don't trust your story.
These Imperials tried to kill me. That ought to make us friends.
Look, I'm after payback. and I thought I'd give you a tip. The surgical labs, where they plant the bombs in prisoners?
They're vulnerable if you can handle the wardens and the torture droids. Take out the labs, no new prisoners.
Only torture droids? We'll shut this place down.
I'll do it.
No one deserves to be imprisoned like this. I'll go.
I'll do it.
Anything I can do to shut this place down.
Sounds like a plan.
Sure, I could cause some damage around here.
I'll check it out.
Noted.
Where's the profit?
Huh. Can't spare a lot, but I have a few toys. Take out the labs, and I'll pay for the help.
Don't try to trick me.
I think we understand each other.
Anything I have from scrounging around is yours--assuming you make it.
Just move along. Don't tell anyone what you saw here.
